name: angular-cache
description: angular-cache is a very useful replacement for Angular's $cacheFactory.

scripts.gzip: echo gzipped size: $(cat dist/angular-cache.min.js | gzip -f9 | wc -c)kb
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle && npm run min
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run karma

4.5.0.name: angular-cache

4.6.0.name: angular-cache
4.6.0.description: angular-cache is a very useful replacement for Angular's $cacheFactory.

scripts.bundle: rollup src/index.js -c -o dist/angular-cache.js -m dist/angular-cache.js.map -f umd && node scripts/postbuild
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle && npm run min
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run karma
